pullrequest.title: Haptix scoring plugin example tutorial using SimEventsPlugin

content.raw: I was a bit confused in the beginning of the tutorial whether I was supposed to run an existing world or edit and existing world. It would probably be nice to explain in the beginning that there is a world ready, and the tutorial is just going through what it does. Maybe even change the order to run the world before explaining what makes it work?
content.html: I was a bit confused in the beginning of the tutorial whether I was supposed to run an existing world or edit and existing world. It would probably be nice to explain in the beginning that there is a world ready, and the tutorial is just going through what it does. Maybe even change the order to run the world before explaining what makes it work?
